N

NeuralNet - Class in com.riskybusiness.neural
     A NeuralNet is a set of Neurons interconnected by Synapses to compute a set of outputs.
NeuralNet(Neuron[], Synapse[]) - Constructor for class com.riskybusiness.neural.NeuralNet
Makes a NeuralNet whose Neurons and Synapses have already been previously made.
NeuralNet(int, int, int...) - Constructor for class com.riskybusiness.neural.NeuralNet
Constructs a NeuralNet with the given amount of Neurons for the input layer, output layer, and consequent hiddenLayers.
Neuron - Class in com.riskybusiness.neural
    This class represents a single artificial cell in a network of said cells that recieves input, processes those inputs, and generates an output.
Neuron(float, float...) - Constructor for class com.riskybusiness.neural.Neuron
Constructs a Neuron which uses the learning rate and weights given as starting points.
Neuron(float...) - Constructor for class com.riskybusiness.neural.Neuron
Constructs a Neuron which uses the weights given and a learning rate of 1.0.
Neuron(float, int) - Constructor for class com.riskybusiness.neural.Neuron
Constructs a Neuron which uses the learning rate given and starts the Neuron with the given amount of inputs, not including the bias weights.
Neuron(int) - Constructor for class com.riskybusiness.neural.Neuron
Makes a Neuron with the given number of inputs and a learning rate of 1.0.
